class StreamNameTranslatable aggregation where
  toStreamName :: aggregation -> String

instance StreamNameTranslatable ByBlockOffset where
  toStreamName :: ByBlockOffset -> String
toStreamName ByBlockOffset {..} = "block_" String -> ShowS
forall a. [a] -> [a] -> [a]
++ Offset -> String
forall a. Show a => a -> String
show Offset
blockOffset

coerce ProposerId
proposerId
